mapper.select: select a.userSeq, a.userName, a.userBirth, a.userGender, a.userId, a.userPw, a.userEmail, a.userPhone, a.userZipCode, a.userAddress, a.userDtAddress, a.userMoDate, a.userReDate, a.userDelNY from user a where 1=1
mapper.insert: insert into user ( userName, userBirth, userGender, userId, userPw, userEmail, userPhone, userZipCode, userAddress, userDtAddress, userMoDate, userReDate, userDelNY ) values( #{userName}, #{userBirth}, #{userGender}, #{userId}, #{userPw}, #{userEmail}, #{userPhone}, #{userZipCode}, #{userAddress}, #{userDtAddress}, now(), now(), 0 )
